titleStmt.title: The speech of the Honorable Sir George Treby, Knight, Recorder of the City of London, upon the presenting the Honorable Dudley North and Peter Rich, Esquires, Sheriffs of the City of London and County of Middlesex, in the Exchequer Chamber at Westminster, on the 30th of September, 1682
titleStmt.author: Treby, George, Sir, 1644?-1700.
Crawley, Francis, 1610 or 11-1683.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
